alert.note: Alert for Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Okeechobee County through 900 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Okeechobee, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Okeechobee, Taylor Creek, Whispering Pines, Okee Tantie Recreation Area and Basswood Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
